name: Cells (Vininski)
description:
Play as a powerful specialized cell responsible for keeping your host alive and safe from hostile viral invaders. Use your antibodies strategically to protect the flow of blood-cells from being infected. You also have the powerful antibiotics in your arsenal but be careful with their use as viral cells can become resistant to them and even more deadly.

- Powerups stack and carry over until you lose

- 14 Levels 

- Endless mode, survive as long as you can!

- Gamepad support

- Procedural map generation
